title: Update homepage hero image to more colorful premium food imagery (site theme unchanged)

requirements.summary: Swap the Home page hero image to the newly edited asset that makes only the food items more vibrant/premium, without changing any global site colors or theme styling.
acceptanceCriteria: Home page continues to render a hero image in the right-side media panel.
The hero image file used by the Home page is updated to the newly generated/edited asset in /assets/generated.
Only the food items in the hero image appear more vibrant/premium; the rest of the website theme/colors remain unchanged (no changes to Tailwind theme variables or global site color styling).

file_operations.description: Add the updated colorful/premium hero image asset (edited so only the food items are more vibrant/premium while the background/palette remains consistent with the existing site).
Update the hero source to use the new asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/hanma-hero-colorful-food.dim_1600x600.png, keeping the existing layout and leaving Tailwind/theme styling unchanged.
